Plot: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.
Title: To Be or Not to Be
Writer: Melchior Lengyel (original story), Edwin Justus Mayer (screenplay)
Actors: Carole Lombard, Jack Benny, Robert Stack, Felix Bressart
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.
